Bombshell: What next?

Chop Shop transform to beats mode, so does Shrapnel.=
 The autoguns shoot Shrapnel right in the ass and make him run forward...

=
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: *Orchid* 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.=
com 
  Sent: Sunday, February 17, 2002 12:34 AM
  Subject: Re: Insecticons.=
 Can you dig it, Chivtrons?...


  OOC: Airly, you better reply to those sh=
ots soon. I don't care if you don't want to lose, I'm sick of your moding!!=


  IC:

  Periwinkle stares and starts crapping. A large pile of crap now =
sits on the ground. She turns, dropping to her knees. She buries her face i=
n the pile and starts eating away.

  McGowan: Hear this you shit eaters! G=
et out here and fight!

  Virgo was in a laughing spell, pointing to Periwi=
nkle. The others, too, could not help but laugh.

  McGowan: And, now! You =
will come out by the time I count to 10, or Brown will be ingested and dige=
sted!...1....2....3....4....5.....6.....7......

    ----- Original Message=
 ----- 
    From: Narrator 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Satur=
day, February 16, 2002 8:03 AM
    Subject: Re: Insecticons. Can you dig it=
, Chivtrons?...


    Bombshell: Of course!

    He sends a signal to the c=
erebro shell in Periwinkle's head, it tells her to crap and eat it.

    Bo=
mbshell: Nobody has as much fun as me...

      ----- Original Message ----=
- 
      From: *Orchid* 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Satu=
rday, February 16, 2002 7:55 AM
      Subject: Re: Insecticons. Can you dig=
 it, Chivtrons?...


      McGowan: Hmm...You got a point there....He is sh=
it....Well, think it over and let me know.

      Brown was quite relieved =
that nothing happened yet. McGowan then whispered to him.

      McGowan: D=
on't be so relaxed....Any chivtron in my hands is sure to die....

      Pe=
riwinkle dances around like a fool. She does the mambo and also dances like=
 Rikishi Phatu.

      Virgo and the others laugh.

      Virgo: Make her e=
at her own crap!...

        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: Na=
rrator 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: Saturday, Februar=
y 16, 2002 5:11 AM
        Subject: Re: Insecticons. Can you dig it, Chivtr=
ons?...


        Chop Shop: (GASP!) Wouldn't that make me a dung beetle? I=
 don't know, it'd be pretty cool, actually.

        Barrage was hit by a s=
hot from the base. He totally ignored Apocalypse and aimed a gun at the shi=
elds. He was hit by another shot, but then fired 2 missiles at the base. Ra=
nsack holds his hand out and a charge comes out of his wrist. He pressed a =
button as it lands in his hand, and then throws it at the base. It's set to=
 explode when the timer ticks down. Venom was hit by 3 shots from the base =
and gasps.

        Bombshell: Hee hee hee! What should I make her do? Danc=
e!

        He sends out a signal to the shell in Periwinkle's head to make=
 her dance...

          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: *Orc=
hid* 
          To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
          Sent: Saturday, Febru=
ary 16, 2002 3:51 AM
          Subject: Re: Insecticons. Can you dig it, Ch=
ivtrons?...


          OOC: Damn it! Who controls the base? Cause whoever =
does, reply to my attacks! I'm tired of being ignored! And yet everything s=
eems to go on very casually. Why? Cause I'm not popular like Airly? And Air=
ly, it is McGowan's team! Not Barrymore! And it's Barrymore with an I...

 =
         IC:

          Periwinkle stops struggling and stares into space a=
fter the cerebro shell was inserted in her head. She was now Bombshell's sl=
ave...

          McGowan swiftly dodges the autoguns shots. Virgo, Birdbot=
 and Papertron are struck by the several shots but hold their ground. On th=
e other hand, Barrymore, Lee and Depp dodged the shots. Barrymore with a si=
dejump, Lee with and duck & roll and Depp with a high jump. She remembered =
that although Pink was dead, they still had Brown.

          McGowan: I ho=
pe you Shitrons know that there is going to be another death over here! You=
r precious little Shitron is about to suffer!

          Depp passes Brown =
to McGowan. McGowan first watches Virgo fire off 8 shots, Barrymore fire of=
f 6 shots, Lee fire off 2 fireballs, Depp fire off 4 plasma shots, Birdbot =
fire 2 more grenades and Papertron fire off 10 shots. McGowan smiled, watch=
ing all of the shots go sailing towards the Chivtron base. McGowan turns to=
 the Insecticons.

          McGowan: Hey, if someone doesn't come out soon=
, would you mind eating this guy?

          Brown eyes widened and hoped t=
hat the Insecticons would do something less brutal...

            ----- Or=
iginal Message ----- 
            From: Airshadow Nightlight 
            T=
o: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
            Sent: Saturday, February 16, 2002 1:=
50 AM
            Subject: Re: Insecticons. Can you dig it, Chivtrons?...

=

            OOC: Regarding Rudra's ooc's post I'll post with Aerotaur. 

 =
           Windlord/Aerotaur/Nightlight::: 

            "Stop little one!!=
" said Aerotaur while he took at Trinity and left her in Nightlight's arms.=
 

            "But I wanna help, uncle Aerotaur"said Trinity. 

          =
  "No yet"replied Aerotaur  who turned on the base's defences. 

          =
  The external defences turned on and fired against the Insecticons and Bar=
rimore's team.
